content.detailedDescription:
I was playing with the tennis ball with my little dog woody on a summer night in 1978 between 12th and 13th avenues and southwest 1st street in miami, florida.  while tossing the ball against a boarded up window of the duplex second floor across the patio from my home, i looked just a tad west of due north, east of the orange bowl stadium area, east of st. john bosco catholic church, up 13th avenue, and saw what i took for a stationary hovering helicopter's headlight.  i gave it no thought and kept playing tennis ball with my little dog woody.  a few minutes later, i glanced in the same direction and that light was still there, and i thought "wow, that helicopter (no noise) has sure been sitting still for a long time," and went back to playing ball with my dog.  a few minutes later still, i looked again and that light was still there, and i thought
"what is that?" so i gave woody the tennis ball and walked toward the north end of the patio-parking driveway, and started staring at the light.
after a few minutes, it began suddenly to "heat up" as if from the inside of it, and rose silently and smoothly straight up into the air.  
now, i still wasn't thinking ufo, i just kept watching it.  it began to move to the east until it was north-northeast above my home and it looked like a white, round dinnerplate against the dark night sky.
then abruptly it "turned off,"  the light went off, and i remember thinking what the heck??  and then it came back on, this time blue, then went off, and came back on red, went off, came back on blue, went off (i'm not sure how many times it went off and came back on, each time changing from red to blue, still utterly silent, and then it came back on white and stayed on white.  then, and again it looked about the size of a dinner plate, then smaller ones, that looked about the size of a golf-ball by comparison to a dinner plate, emerged from it and lined up one after the other in a straight line and sat there a few seconds.  then abruptly the smaller ones took off in all directions, clear across the sky in all directions, zig zagging without curving at all, and the big light kept putting out smaller ones that lined up one after the other and took off zig zagging clear across the sky.  at this moment is when i thought "ufo" and ran shouting into my house and got my dad (and i think my mom and sister came out too), and my grandma (who has since died - in 1994 - etc., and we stood out in the yard and watch the big one silently move around smoothly in the sky, putting out more little ones that took off zigzagging, and this must have lasted at least an hour and a half from when i first saw the light off to my north-northwest.  at some point, i went inside and called the military station (navy i think) in coconut grove and a man answered, and before i could tell him what i was seeing, he said, "those aren't yoo-foes (((that's how he pronouced ufo's, yoo-foes))), he said, "the're flares being shot off on key biscayne."  and i told him, sir, this is not a flare.  and it didn't come from key biscayne, it had been sitting in place to my north and northwest for a long time, in one place before it started moving" ((key biscayne was just east of due-south of my location between 12th and 13th avenue and southwest 1st street near downtown miami, in "little havana".))
the man flat-out lied to me.  and when i told him that it came from the north-northwest, he again lyingly said that "they are flares from key biscayne."  what a crock of nonsense.  there was nothing in the sky to my south or southeast before of during the entire event.  this came from the north-northwest and had sat still for about 20 minutes in the air before it ever began to move.
anyway, that is what i remember.  my dad still remembers watching this, and says to this day that it was the weirdest thing he has ever seen in his life.
let me make clear:  i didn't see anything that looked like a "space-ship", no windows, it was a perfectly round white light that changed colors and put out smaller versions of itself that zig-zagged all over the sky without curving at all.
it was a fascinating experience, and it made me know (know, not merely believe) that the ufo phenomenon is real, not imaginary.
but though it was fascinating, it was very uncanny, and
i truly am not looking forward to ever seeing anything like that again.
thanks for listening & god bless.
d.R.
north miami beach, florida, usa
content.summary: Stationary light in sky which then moved, changed colors, put out smaller white lights

content.detailedDescription: In backyard taking pictures and somethig flew by and i cauaght it on my camera i have other picture of other objects that cant be identified
content.summary: White streak  flying      across by base

content.detailedDescription:
just before sunset on a summer day in 1985 i was at my mom's home and as i looked out the window facing south towards us hwy 90 i noticed a bright light moving slowly west to east, visible just above the treetops across the wide highway. i observed this for a short period of time. i went to my room and got the binoculars, by this time the twilight had just turned to dark. the object, now a bright white circle bigger that a star, was moving north to south and directly away from me when i returned to the window. i focused the binoculars on the object and saw a white ball of light with a rotating band of colored balls of blinking lights. the object seemed to be slowly tumbling as the band would be high on left, low on right, then change to low on left, high on right, about every half minute. i wacthed this for at least 5 minutes untill it was too small to make out as it moved away from me to the south over the eastern end of the mississippi sound of the gulf of mexico about 3 miles to the south.
 i was certain this was something unusual when i first noticed it. i really felt i was getting a good look at a real ufo.
content.summary: Observed light moving west to east, then with binoculars observed it moving south away from me.

content.detailedDescription: In backyard taking pictures and somethig flew by and i cauaght it on my camera i have other picture of other objects that cant be identified
content.summary: White streak  flying      across by base

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving a couple of friends home in burnaby and swung by a different route than i normally take.  as we were getting off of lougheed highway and taking the slip to winston street, i saw what looked like a bright blueish-white light in the low, eye level skyline.  i thought it was a planet at first, as it wasn't bright enough to be a plane or a helicopter.  but then it started moving towards us.  i slowed the car down and asked my passengers if they saw it too, which of course they did.  the object was approximately 1000ft in the air and was below the cloud line.    it was moving towards us.  we thought it was a plane or a helicopter, but there were no accompanying lights.  as it got closer, almost above us, we noticed that it was grey or silver in colour and had no wings or rotors.  so  we were curious as to how it was flying.  it wasn't moving very fast either, so we clearly saw it and watched it for a couple of minutes before we drove off. another strange thing was that there was no sound emanating from it.   

a day later, one of my other friends saw it and called me, asking me about it as he was watching it in the sky near the same area.  although when he saw it, there was a red blinking light towards the back.  four days after that sighting, he saw it once more, but with no light other than the blue one.  he heard no sounds from it either and with it being so low in the sky, one would expect sound, especially with cloud cover just above it.
content.summary: Shaped like the body of an airplane, but with no wings or tail, and a blue-white light in the front, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
today, while lying on the rocks with some hippies in the barton creek greenbelt, i observed a very distant point of silver light hovering motionless in what i assumed to be the upper atmosphere. i immidiately turned to my friends and said, "i think thats a u.F.O.". they were excited, but not as surprised as i had expected. one of my friends turned to me at once and said, " yeah, juan here's been tellin' us 'bout em'. says he's seen em flyin around on and off all day." (typical, huh?) juan jumped up from his crosslegged position and asked me to point it out for him. i assume that the others present were to intoxicated to make out such a small light, or perhaps they just didn't care. (i was only under the influence of the ussual nicotine buzz, and jaun quit drinking a couple of weeks ago)

 we watched it for a few minutes and observed niether any change in the position nor the intensity of the light for several minutes. it appeared to be composed of a highly reflective metallic substance, but i wouldn't make a bet on that assertion. it dissapeared abruptly after about 6 minutes, and i did not see any other lights.

the sky was a deep, healthy shade of blue during the sighting, and there were no visible clouds in the vicinity. 

i witnessed a very similiar phenomenon last march and i plan to re-post the mufon report shortly. 

peace.
content.summary: Distant point of silver light over austin. motionless, dissapearing abruptly.

content.detailedDescription: I was attending the stan romanek presentation at st cajetan's church on the auraria campus near downtown denver.  shortly after 4:00 pm (4:15?) a break was called (the program ran from 2pm to 6pm).  many people, including me, went outside.  it was a very nice day, mild (in the 40's), partly sunny, very light breeze.  i just looked at the sky casually, but then i noticed a lot of people were looking and pointing and yelling about something in the sky.  they were all looking north or northwest.  i asked someone to point them out to me; it took me about 30 seconds to notice them for myself.  they appeared to be white.  most people said they looked like spheres (in fact, some said they were perfect spheres) but to me they looked more flattened, like a disc would look; however, i wear glasses and my prescription is 4 years old and i know i don't have 20/20 vision with them anymore.  a few people had cameras or cell phones with cameras and were trying to take pictures.  i saw that one person has already posted their report and included 3 photos.  they do look more rounded in the photos, so it was probably my eyesight that made them look more flattened somehow.  a couple of people thought they were balloons, but i did not think so for 2 reasons.  first, they did not drift together in the same direction like balloons would be if carried by the wind.  they would change direction, go into and out of clouds, and move in opposite directions to one another and stop and hover, then move again.  there were 3 or 4 initially, then only 2, then only 1.  then i went back inside because the program was to resume.  either the other objects took off so fast i couldn't see them, or they disappeared, or went behind a cloud or two.  stan was outside for a few minutes and also saw them but said it was hard to tell whether "they" were there for him and the crowd, or whether it was balloons or whatever; he didn't watch them for long and went back inside.  he asked the crowd later how many people saw the objects and a lot of hands went up, probably more people saw them than didn't.  last summer at the ufo watchtower, where stan also was, there was a similar looking sighting--bright white color, very distant and high in the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Distant white objects seen by crowd at college campus

content.detailedDescription:
It was a rainy, dreary, cold day. my ex-husband and myself had been at his aunt's house in the country all day and into the evening. we were going back into town, just on the outskirts where there was a sewage treatment plant. there was no traffic on the road and as we rounded the corner this blinding white light seemed to encompass the car.

the next thing i remember is being on the old oak st bridge and being so scared and my ex was driving so fast we were fishtailing all over the bridge. there is a lapse in memory from the sewage plant to the bridge which is about 5 miles, or so. it was like we lost that part of the drive.

once on the bridge, i remember looking up and seeing this star-like object following us the rest of the way home, which had to have been another 2 or 3 miles. we were both so terrified, neither one of us could speak.

upon arriving at the house, i watched as the object zig-zagged in the sky and then was gone. we both leaped from the car and ran into the house, both of us almost hysterical, telling my aunt & uncle and a couple of their friends, what we had just witnessed. as you can imagine, they all started laughing at us and turning it into a joke. i insisted it was all true, but my ex, because of the ridiculing we were taking, started denying that it had happened. i was furious with him, but he continued to deny the event. several years after the fact, my ex-husband and myself had a chance to sit and discuss the event and he admitted to me that he did in fact see what we had both originally witnessed.

i have always wanted to be hyptonized to see if i could remember the entire incident and to find out what happened in that lost 5 miles, if anything.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Rainy, cold evening, coming back into town, passed sewer plant and were enveloped in white light

content.detailedDescription: I was out with family, going for a holiday lights viewing ride in a car.  we decided to drive around the ritzy neighborhood on the north side of green mountain.  i noticed earlier that there was a full moon and it was very bright, in the ene sky.  i like looking at the moon, so occasionally i would look at it again.  one time i looked at it there was a bright light just to the right of the moon.  i assumed it was venus or a bright star, although i've never seen one so close to such a bright full moon.  i looked again about 10 minutes later, and now the same light was to the left of the moon.  that didn't seem right to me.  someone told me they thought it was probably mars.  two problems with that:  it didn't have the usual reddish tint and was brighter than it would be even if it was away from a full moon--it should have appeared even dimmer to me because of the brightness of the full moon so close to it; and how did it move over to the other side of the moon?  i decided at the time to doubt my observations, but now i am more curious, as there have been other reports of this object, one with photos, on this site.  i didn't mention it at the time to anyone; they were only looking at the holiday lights in that neighborhood. i am a member of mufon and colorado mufon; my mufon id is 10646.
content.summary: Bright light appearing near the full moon

content.detailedDescription: In 1980, i had a paper route on the hill above my house and would deliver the papers between 3:30am and 4:30am each morning. i drove my car and threw the papers out of the sunroof, but there was a house, sitting alone with no other houses around for 3-4 lots on each side, and the streetlight above had burnt out and i was required to stop my car, walk over to the porch area and toss the paper onto the front door area. as i was walking back to my car, the entire area suddenly became lit up in a bright blue light. i turned around and saw this sphere moving over the roof of the house, maintaining a constant distance from the roof, and emitting a very bright blue light, but making no noise nor any odors. it floated down to about 5 feet above the ground, about 10 feet in front of me. as i watched, i stood motionless and obviously totally amazed. i don't think that i had any thoughts running through my head, i was an observer in the truest sense of the word, simply watching this thing in front of me, hovering above the ground. as soon as my brain kicked in, and i started to think, " what could it be?", it went from directly in front of me to over the top of the hill, out of my sight, in a fraction of a second, it's movement producing a blue streak in my vision that followed it over the hill. no sounds, nothing, just zip! and it was gone.I finished my paper route without incident.As i thought about it later that day and since then, i feel that it must have been a probe of some kind, unoccupied (it was only as big as a medicine ball, maybe twice the size of a baskerball)and the fact that it maintained a constant distance above the roof, following the roof line, makes me think that it was measuring something, or doing some sort of investigative monitoring. i also beleive that it left the area when it sensed cognizant thought on my part, as if it wanted to remain secret and i had accidentally seen something that i wasn't supossed to--ergo, the hasty retreat.
content.summary: Saw a sphere the size of a medicine ball emitting bright blue light, it hovered 15 feet in front of me 5 ft. off the ground and then flew away at super speed, no noise

content.detailedDescription:
Well, im an 11th grader at hilton highschool. im not an outsider looking for some attention or publicity. me and my friends have become local celebritys at our high school due to an event that has occured in 2005. 
  it all started may 29th 2005. around 9 pm ryan williams 8th grdae, keith poloats 8th grade, kyle collins 7th grdae, derick houser 9th grade, a black kid named tim 6th grade, and i 8th grade had been roaming the streets and causing trouble. we had finished fighting some kids we disliked, and got the bright idea to egg the kids house when it got dark. at about 9, we did. i lived in cedar terrace apartment 99 with my father at the time. currently im in 143 with my mother. we had gone back to my back porch, and was chilling out for the night. my back door faced the driveway and parking lot. i was sitting on the steps, tim in a chair, this kid derek was standing, and keith was walking on the curb in the driveway area. 
 while i was talking to one of them, i was loudly cut off by the sound of keiths voice. as we looked at him, his finger was pointing twords the sky over my roof, and he yelled "what the fuck is that!". we all jumped up, as we did, we hear a simualr sound to a burning furnace. as i looked directly above my head, a ginat green and orange fireball fly over my roof, spewing forth shining gold dust like particles. it was so low to the ground, it had skimmed the top on the tree in my backyard. branches came down allright. it continued to travel about another few sconds twords the parking lot, then dissapeared. at this point we were crazy. that was the coolest thing we have ever seen. we ran to the parking lot. the black kid tim statred freaking out and punched keith in the face when he suddenly turned around in front of him. we just laughfed about it. there was this mexican family that lived there at the time that faced the parking lot. they was all out on the back porch tword the parking lot, one guy name chad was smoking a joint. as we made it to the parking lot, was shouted to them " did u see that! blah blah  a ufo fireball blha blah". they laughed and thought we were crazy, sarcasticaly remarking, yeah chad saw it! haha. at this point, derek, tim and kyle had gone home. 
me keith and ryan went into my house. we called my dad's cell phone, he had been out on a date. being the ufo and alien guy that he is, i couldnt wait to tell him the amazing story. the call didnt go well. i pictured him at a resurant, and his phone rings. he picks it up, and hear three boys screaming into the phone all at once, only making out the words ufo and aliens. that call ended with " im glading your having fun boys, stay out of trouble". 
at this point, it was about 10 when we decided to do somthing. the parking lot ends and turns into a hill. at the bottom is a huge empty lot, at the end of that is a tree line about 30 feet thick, then a huge feild on the other side. when ever i herd of any ufo storys, they always seemed to take place in feilds. so we decided to grab a flshlight, and check it out! as we aproched the woods, ryan then rufused to enter. we grabbed him and tryed to force him in. he was such a wimp, but finaly we entered the woods about 5 minutes later of fighting with him. keith was first, i was second, ryan last. keith had the light. we made it to the feild. it was extremly dark, no moon or anything. we felt black top, and relized we were standing on this rely old horse track thing. there is a horse farm right by there, must have been why it was there. keith had been tieing his shoes when i noticed somthing standing about 15 feet away. as have goose bumbs as i write this next part. ryan was bickering about how there nothing here and we should leave. thats when i wrabbed keiths wrist with the light in his hand, and directed it to the spot i had noticed a dark figure. man, if im lyin im dying. we shone the light onto the face of a reptile like creature. god its eyes were so big. it was like the same design as a fly has on its eyes, like a window screen. the were cleary oily. greens and purples and oranges mixed in, glisening in the light. the skin was white, very very white. the creature stood about 7 and a half feet tall. this wasnt a rosewell alien, this was a huge muscle bound tall ass thing that could have ripped us apart. its neck was vey long and skinny, showing its esophogus through it. we screamed like girls. the next part is truly terrifying. the creature was standing next to a bush. it was about up to his midsection. he lefted his leg up and stepped over the bush! its ankles were thin and it had long webbed feet! at this point we ran faster then ever. i felt so scared and was just screaming. we reched the trees and then, directly to our right side, stood another one. yes, this all happened, and i would swear my life on it, and ryan and keith would to. we were complelty sobre, and in solem mind. we just kept running, till we reached the lot, then the top at of the hill. i cant explain it, but we stopped right there, we just knew to, we like knew at that point we were safe. we sat there staring into the dark woods for about a half of an hour. when you see somthing that incredable, its like u cant belive it. i said aloud " that didnt happen, its impossible, its not real". keith had looking right into my eyes, and right there, the toughest kid in our grade, keith poloats had tears in his eyes and said to me " you can not denie what just happened. we never told a soul. never. 
the next day we drew up a picture of the thing, and wrote a story about what had happend. ever since, im a complete ufo and extra terrestrial nut. i assure you, im no ufo nerd or geeky kid that gets pushed around at school. we actualy are considered very popular and we get all the girls. this event rely did happen. i tell of it now, because its been leaked out, why not leak it out to some higher authority. ryan began telling evryone last school year. one night a i gota phone call from a girl i had dated, she called to ask me of an event that happend in 05. she said ryan had told her and evryone. my heart froze. "great, mike grana is gonna be known as the alien freak". well, to my luck, the exact oppisite happened. our town is so boring and lame, nothing to do but drugs, fight, start bands or have partys, and this crazy story spread like wild fire. evry kid in town ate it up. theres these partys held by a boy whos parents own the apple farm. back on his land, he throws enormous partys with bands and food and bonfires and evrything. "the alien story" is a now legendary tale of hiltonknights, told around the bonfires.
content.summary: Flying ufo, aliens in woods

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were driving from lorain ohio to columbus ohio for electronic music party titled strangley "transformation". date was some time between 1999-2001 date can be confirmed. i was driving my blue chevy cavalier  on 71 south the fastest way to make the trip. we made it probably more than halfway to columbus it was pitch black out at the time as any body who travels that stretch of 71 south knows it is quite desolate. of course at time of sighting there was no traffic on freeway. it was complete blackness behind us no car headlights could be seen and a semi truck was way way ahead of us i could barley see its tail lights,when all of a sudden i look up thru my front windshield and i point out to my friend jared "look a shooting star" the "shooting star" was traveling longitugional at a great deal of speed and i was expecting it to just disperse like shooting stars do...But it didnt it kept traveling strait across our forward point of view and going and going for @ least 45 seconds .My foot lifted of the gas a bit as we were watching in disbelief and we slowed way down and watched ,then it started taking the strange directory of a missle changing directions to head twords earth .Jared pointed out it really looked like it was a missle attack, it moved to a 90 degree angle in 3 sharp turns by the 2nd turn this thing splits in two objects and follows just a tiny bit a head of the other following the same trajectory to complete the 90 degree turn strait twords the earth this was all happening about 2 to 3  miles up in the air and at tremendous speeds, when the objects completed the 90 degree turn  about a mile or two up it headed strait tword the ground then about a mile off the ground ,it not really exploded but more like formed into a giant, giant golden (a gold ive never seen before) what i can only explain as a fire ball whith a brilliant white  giant orb in the center, it looked almost angelic in its colors, then we watched as went strait down twords the ground  behind the forest that we were travelling parralel to, to the front right in front of us about a mile back into the woods, now the really strange thing was... we were already in shock, expecting to see a huge explosion as in mushroom cloud huge  i was gripping the steering wheel expecting to make an evasive manuver but......There was nothing no explosion no noise.No lights behind the woods  no fire no vibrations nothing...Nothing but silence and the pitch blackness of central ohio there are no street lights in that section of the highway , so we where really in disbelief when were a second ago bathed in golden light then ther was nothing  but darkness besides my  dim headlights we had slowed from abut 75 mph to about 20 mph we sat there stunned there were no other cars for miles.

the duration of the event lasted about 3 to 4 minutes give or take a minute evrything seemed to slow down . i can best describe the distance this thing travelled as "from the far left view of my wind shield ---all the way across my field of view to the right side of us and the turn occured twords the right side of my field of view and the expansion into the fire ball occured to the farthest right field of veiw from the front windshield we never had to look out the side windows, it all occured right in front and up were we had to almost lean a little forward to see it more clearly. in ohio youll see many shooting stars but in all my time of being in rual areas ive never seen this behavior in "shotingstars they usually flash in and flashout with in seconds & move more naturally. this thing moved more mechaniclly, as if steered or directed, and it splitting in to two disticnt obejects almost racing twords there destination. 

we continued our trip to columbus and made it to the party within about 45minutes to an hour we walked around in a bit of a daze telling a couple people of what we seen. but not many,it was kind of draining to be honest. another crazy thing was i met  2 girls there from our area who i ended up really connecting with for a few years. later that summer jared painted a picture of the event  that brought back really crazy feelings as if something deeper had occured. im not sure if any one even belives us . for fear of sounding crazy i rarely speak of it but think about it and actually dream about it often.
content.summary: First started like shooting star,split in 2 ,did 90deg.Turn spread into huge golden fire ball and went strait down into forest.Disapeerd.

content.detailedDescription: I'm not actually reporting a sighting. i made up the times and dates but that doesn't matter. what i have seen can be seen on any clear night. i have a question. what are the objects that i see a night. they look like stars until you notice that they flash red, blue and green. i have looked at them with binoculars and the colors go around the outter edge of the craft rather like a lighthouse light. i have seen as many as eleven on one night. i have been told that these are ufos.  if they are, why aren't they talked about on these ufo hunter tv shows? thanks for any information you have time to send. joyce johnson
content.summary: Lights around the edge that flash in color

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch, taking pictures of the sky, and i went back to check what pictures i had taken as i checked them, i caught two pictures of what i believe to be a ufo.
content.summary: Black object flying over moutain

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from talking a walk along the creek where i lived in echo, oregon on the 4th of july, 2005. i noticed in the sky (which was clear and blue) 7 objects clustered together which appeared, at first, to be a bunch of kids balloons floating high in the sky. it was the fourth of july and i thought some kid had lost his balloons from a nearby town that was 10 miles away. i was facing east and the wind was blowing fairly well at maybe 15 mph from west to east (the normal prevailing wind in that area) however, the "balloons" were traveling from north to south. there was a farmer's orange wind sock nearby (which is used for crop dusting) which verified the wind direction. i thought maybe the upper winds might be blowing differently than the ground winds and that might account for what i was seeing. i watched the "balloons" more carefully then while i was wondering about them and estimated their altitude to be approximately 2000 to 2500 feet high, if, they were normal size kids balloons. i estimated their speed to be approximately 40 mph if they were normal sized kids balloons. while i was observing them more closely, i noticed there were 7 "balloons", which were of the same color of the sky and would be very difficult to notice unless viewed directly. they were not bobbling around like balloons would, but rather, they were moving uniformly in loose formation all together as if a coordinated flight of aircraft. i then noticed that the leading 3 balloons were slowly separating from the trailing 4 balloons and were obviously on a slightly separate course from each other and were widening their position from each other as they continued south across the sky. at this point in my observation, the lead 3 balloons seemed to make a very slight course change for several seconds and then recorrect because, all 3 at one time had what was undoubtedly, sun reflections appear horizontally across the width of each balloon sphere. the trailing 4 balloons did not have these sun reflections and continued to widen their separation from the leading 3. after approximately 5 seconds, the leading 3 balloons appeared to correct their course and the sun reflections disappeared from them at the same time. after this, the objects were too far away and too close to the sun to see. i want to say at this point i did not think these objects were extraterrestial. i did think the united states air force has something they are not telling us about, and this is still my impression of what i saw to this day.
content.summary: 7 balloon objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting off from work and just so happened to look up in the sky.
(it was a slight cloud coveraged and noted these blue lights randomly flying.
the first conclusion i came to was, there was a nightclub/car lot or some event occurring that were flashing or projecting these lights so i drove around the area to see if any lights were being projected/even went to a higher elevation and could not find the source.
when i arrived at home, my neighbors were outside and i asked them to look.
they also saw the lights(blue disks)  one of my neighbors suggested that the mcwance science center may have been conducting an experiment, however, i called the next day and they stated no.
i work at a hospital and pretty much believe in having solid facts. but i saw this and it was amazing.
content.summary: Blue lights randomly flying/

content.detailedDescription: A red object appeared in the sky northwest of the city. it looked almost like it was on fire but you could see lights underneath. it stayed hovering in one spot and began dropping red "lights" down to earth. after it stopped dropping lights it stayed there for another minute or so then just vanished.
content.summary: Ufo dropping "lights" down to earth

content.detailedDescription:
I, my daughter and friend pulling into my driveway, stepped out of my vehicle and walked toward the front door. as i walked around the vehicle front to the passenger door i observed through a clearing in the trees across the street a very "blue" meteorite falling at a 45 degree angle in the north east horizon on the west range of the sandia mountains. the meteorite left a fairly long trail of blue smaller pieces. i was impressed with the vibrant blue color. i immediately marked my location according to surrounding trees in my view. excitedly i ran into my home to tell my friend and daughter what i had just seen and they followed me back out the front door within 5 seconds. 

we ran to the middle of the unoccupied street (still daylight/dusk coming on in 10 minutes or so.) we watched the same area for 10 brief seconds. 

still in the street, my friend said at the same i looked up, "what's that light?" looking directly above our heads was a very obvious stationary circular shaped blue/white extremely bright light. the altitude of the "light" was unknown. however, looking at approximately the altitude an airplane jet might fly, and below the scattered clouds. 

observing the unmoving light for about 8-10 seconds the light keeping its circular shape began to shrink, it appeared to dim before our eyes. the light continued to shrink dimming to "off." at this point my friend no longer to see the greyish dot, ran back into the house to get the camera and binoculars. i stayed outside in the street keeping my vision locked onto the "dimming" light which then appeared as a tiny pinhead size greyish colored "dot" craft barely visible. the grey dot then proceeded to slowly float a thumbs length north east, pause briefly and slowly float another thumb length still in the north east direction. the grey dot disappeared very high into the few high clouds until i lost sight of it. whether the craft actually increased its altitude or actually dimmed its lights from brilliant to dim is incredible. 

this was my first sighting and i was amazed and thrilled with the experience. watching the light dim, fade, go off, was absolutely incredible. following the path of the pinhead dot as it floated until it was out of sight was a little freaky. very cool...
content.summary: Directly above my head i observed a brilliant blue/white circular light hovering at high altitude.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving home heading onto laurel canyon when i looked up three fast moving bright solid lights passed over head there was heavy cloud cover so they were under the cloud ceiling i watch as they formed a triangle shape and moved onto the horizon. there flight was very smooth and very fast. the experience only last for 2 minutes
content.summary: Three fast moving bright lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
The date of the sighting was the night september 5th, 2006. i arrived at my bathroom ready to take a shower at around 8 pm pst. from the corner of my eye i saw an object accelerating away from me to the south. when i saw the object i immediatly clearly did not think it was an airplane,helicopter, or baloon, but something else. the object was a t-shaped object and was rectangular in shape. it seemed to be no bigger than a small house.I had a good view of the back of the object and some view of its top. i estimated that it was several hundred feet in the air. in the back it had what looked like a thruster in the center and a light on either side. there also seemed to be a light on the top of the object as well. the color of the lights/thruster was a bright blue glow. the lights were blinking and they seemed fairly small. it certainly did not sound like an airplane at all and was very quiet. it hovered for 3-5 seconds then accelerated.It was a low frequency rumble as it accelerated. it did not make any erratic motions, it continued to head south at remarkable speed and within 10-15 seconds it was gone from my viewpoint. during the encounter i was in complete amazement and awe. i stood there for the duration and just watched it. after the sighting i rushed into my mother's room and told her that i had just seen an ufo. then i ran downstairs and told my dad. i took a quick shower and i headed outside with my dad. outside in my backyard i heard a low grumbling noise and noticed a object with lights blinking about a mile away(my house over looks a large hill), it seemed close to miramar airforce base. it headed north towards a commercial center northeast of my house. it flew near/ between two tall buildings and seemed to be going in a zig-zag motion and then accelerated northward. finally after about a couple minutes i could not see the object anymore. i heard the same low grumbling noise for some time afterwards.

--------------

this narrative was based on my memories of my experiences of that night and my report i typed that same night on a ufo discussion website: http://www.Alienhub.Com/showthread.Php?T=313
the attachments below are sketches of the ufo along with descriptions of what i saw on that night(sorry they're bad quality)
i am interested to see if the airbase picked up anything unsual on their radar on that particualar night. 
also i can take a polygraph test and undergo hypnosis if neccesary. 
if you have any questions please email me - thanks
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Rectangular t-shaped object seen from my house. it was viewed from the rear of the ufo. the ufo was fairly close to my vantage point.

content.detailedDescription:
We where driving down a road and me and my dad saw a blue light hovering then it droped down faster then gravity could push a thing then as it was droping it started to look like a boomarang. two days later, we were editing pictures and we saw a ufo in almost every night photo.  so i had a thought and started looking at my video camara and saw the ufo boomaranging like me and my dad saw two days ago.......A have the wosrt creepy shivers now........  when the blue light was hovering, than we it took off it turned green

the video footage and the digital camera photographs show the blue lights, we are drilling an oil well in utah.  this is the same area where there were cattle mutilations years ago.  also one of the oil field workers had disappeared from the well location, there were no tracks from his truck, no footprints etc.  he just vanished from our well site.
content.summary: A circle droped down like a boomarang then disseperd i have video and camara fotteg of them...

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation in montreal canada on 1967, it happened during my visit to the world fair grounds in front of the usa pavillion, i noticed this disc shaped object there standing there, i had my camera ready and just pointed in that direccion and pressed the shatter, i kept this picture for all these many years and i am sharing it with you.
please let me know what do you think it is because i do not know for sure.
thankyou,
hugo
content.summary: Disc shape

content.detailedDescription: While outside enjoying the full moon on a clear evening in october my son and his friend saw a round silver ball 'dancing around the full moon' . nothing we knew of from the air shows or otherwise could 'dance' like that around the moon. the boys had their cell phones 'handy' (love technology these days!) and took several frames. may post photographs later - but these shots are same as those posted in other places here - i.E., round silver balls...This time seeming to dance (moved all around) the full moon in the clear evening sky.
content.summary: Round silver ball - 'dancing'  around the full moon 10/24/2007 in maine

content.detailedDescription: I was outside scraping my windshild and i looked up it came from the east moving west it was not as high in the air that i have seen comercial jets flying it was much lower and moving faster than any thing i ever thought possible it took about a second and a half to pass by.I live about a half mile from the main air port here in okc so it also passed over the airport. if i had not looked up i would have never know it came by it was totaly silent if there was noise it was plenty close to hear it.It was round and had a dull silver white glow to it. it did not streak in with a tail like a meteor it was moving from east to west not that far from the ground.I now know why their are so few photos of these things if i had a camera in my hand there is still no way i could have reacted.
content.summary: Disk shape pale white glow

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i could not sleep last night very well. finally i woke up at 5am made coffee and went onto the balcony to smoke a cigarette.
my balcony is facing north- east.

the sky was clear of clouds and the night was quiet.
i saw 2 perfect circles (in perspective)close to each other.They were not moving. both were indentical in size and clarity. they both had lights that were flickering.Hence i could not count them, but they were arranged in circle as well. 
i took a picture with my 35mm camera and checked every 5-10 min if it was still there. 
i took another picture at 6am.
finally, around 6:30am to 7am it was gone.

i was not feeling disturbed, nor threathened. just amazed and curious.

this is my first sighting.
content.summary: 2 bright circles close to each other

content.detailedDescription: As i stood on my front stoop to look at the neaby lake, i saw a triangle of orange lights ascending slowly from the northeast. as it gained altitude, it seemed to waver back and forth, rather than climbing in a straight line like a passenger or freight airplane. it flew towards me and over my head, and as it did so, i saw the three lights pulsing on and off, similarly to the way a mac computer light pulses. as it came over the top of me i could see it more closely, as it was only about 500 feet above me. it was the shape of a large cross. it was similar to an old style celtic cross, with the cross bar directly in the center. after that it disappeared from sight behinds the mountains.
content.summary: Light colored cross-shaped with three pulsing orangish lights in a triangle on the underside

content.detailedDescription:
I wrote this up for some ufo group back in 1987  but i have put my thoughts on youtube.Com recently. we were flying from newark to nashville , tenn on  either sept 15 or 16 in  1987 for an iapd convention.
a bunch of plastic people.
about 30 mins out of  nashville just before our descent i noticed a shinny
sphere about30 degrees in front of my perpendicular  out the side of the plane. it was on the right side and about the same alitude as us.
this went on for about 10 mins.During this time i spoke to a bob scheffler about the object . he claimed it was a plane until i asked him if he saw a tail or wings .. then he said your right it is a ufo.
i got out of my seat and asked all the passengers if they could see it.
they said yes....
i went back to my seat and then as it kept pace with us..
it dove away and immediately zoomed up into the cloud base. in a flash.
maybe a second.
it was i think at that exact time that we started our decent.
perhaps when the pilot pulled back on the throttle or nosed down 
the zoom thing happened. the pilot denied there was anythinghtere.
i called the traffic controllers  and sent in a report to some organization.
maybe in new england,  i can't remember.
the sphere was 10-15 feet in diameter and about 1/4 to 1/2 mile away..Is my best guesstament.
 i do not know the county.

joe dupont
content.summary: Chrome like sphere tracking 737

content.detailedDescription:
I was checking out a live web cam feed of the taos mountains in new mexico when i saw this really strange looking green object in the night sky. 
the website is www.Taoswebcam.Com
content.summary: An unknown green object  in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
On vacation to arizona in february of 2006, i photographed a bird perched on a cactus (or other plant). i am a photographer and as i usually do - i snapped multiple shots of the same object. in this case i took 4 photos. it wasn't until i was back in minnesota looking at the images, that i noticed strange objects off in the distance in frames 2 and 4. the 4 photos are basically the same and were shot only seconds apart from the same exact spot. however the objects are not in the 1st or 3rd frames.

i have put the 4 images on my web site. first they appear as the image i photographed. in this set you can see the "trail" left by the object to the left has a bit of a curve to it as it goes to the left. then i cropped all four images to bring the objects and the area that the objects appears in for a closer examination. in this set i cropped the photos so that the bird and it's perch are visible. in a third set i cropped even more to only view the blue sky area where the object is and isn't. then in a 4th set i am only showing the two photos where the object appears. 

notice the slight difference between these two photos. the two objects that are almost "traveling" in a straight line are a little more off-set in the latter photo.

as you can see in the time/date stamp under the photos when enlarged (by clicking on the photo) that there is only one second time elapsed between photo number 2 and 3, and again only one second between photos 3 and 4. but what happened to the objects in the 3rd photo?

take a look for yourself....  it is a mystery to me.
http://www.Candadcamera.Com/gallery?G2_view=core.Showitem&g2_itemid=128134

these "sets" are not separated - you will have to just figure out the order. however, if you look at the jpg numbers that will help as they are in order: dsc_5854.Jpg,  ...5855..., ...5856..., ...5857...

the photos were taken at 2:38 pm on february 19, 2006. we were at (i believe) the saguaro park just to the west of tucson, az.

the objects look to me as though they are some sort of craft that is traveling at a high rate of speed and has separated. i am confused when i try to imagine which direction they are traveling because of the sloping "trail" to the left and the object to the right looks like a space shuttle entering the atmosphere and traveling to the left. then it becomes more confusing that these objects that appear to be traveling fast are basically at a stand still between the 2nd and 4th frames which is a time span of 2 seconds. it almost appears as though the bird is spitting but where did it go in the 3rd photo? and even something like "bird spit" (which i'm not too sure about)would travel some distance in two seconds. are we seeing a different dimension? any ideas?

i obviously had no reaction or feelings at the time because i didn't know the objects were there. when i saw them, however it brought chills up and down my spine....  memories of weird things that happened around my hometown in sw minnesota around 1965. that is another story for another time.
content.summary: 4 photos of bird, 2nd and 4th reveal objects in distance

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from the dmacc campus in ankeny and i was almost in the altoona city limits when all of a sudden a bright white flashing light came from out of nowhere at first it was traveling north but then it switched directions and began heading south but then it started pulsing red and the white flashing light was gone there was just red glowing lights then the object again switched directions and started heading west and it was descending as it was flying west but it didn't have any similar lights to planes flying around the area i have never seen lights on a plane like the ones this object had plus it switched directions too many times it was hard to tell the shape but this object looked strange it was in sight for about five minutes i think ufo sightings are on the rise in my area because just two weeks ago a huge craft flew over altoona which i did report to this site i wonder if anyone else in town is seeing these strange craft
content.summary: Another strange pulsing object i've seen before is back but with different features
